block.p: Wait Begins in Tire Recall The recall of millions of Firestone tires sent panicked customers rushing to service centers only to be told, in many cases, that they would have to wait more than a year for replacements. PAGE C1

British Group's Chechen Ties Responding to a Russian accusation that it had trained Chechen rebels, a British-based mine-clearing group, Halo Trust, admitted that some of the Chechens it trained might have ''joined the fighters.'' PAGE A9

Child Poverty Up Since '79 Child poverty has fallen in many states in the current economic boom, but nationwide the rate is still higher than it was 20 years ago, with more than 13 million children living in poverty. PAGE A10
